name: Greenie Mouse
tag_list: baby-detergent, baby-product, boutique-bb, phytothrapie, produits-biologiques, produits-cologiques, chinace, sirop-enfant
overview:
Souris Verte offers a full range of specially blended care products to treat young children, mothers and babies. Although our products, like our baby detergent are mild, the highly concentrated mixtures are an effective baby product. They will comfort, calm and soothe or reinforce and summon the body’s natural defenses as required. The herbs we use have been time-proven for children because they are mild, well tolerated and safe.

Souris Verte has herbal remedies and herbal skin care products specially conceived to treat young children, mothers and babies. Entirely plant based, hypoallergenic with organic herbal extracts added. Our baby product line contains no artificial colouring agents, additives or chemical preservatives. This is a baby product that is guaranteed to be 100% free of petroleum derivatives like Vaseline, silicone and mineral oil.
